name: Robert V.
text: There was no other solution. We could only hope that their theories were true.

name: Robert V.
text: If they were right, then I've saved us from an awful guinea pig fate.

name: Robert V.
text: ... Then I've sent us to a fate far more fatal, yet far less cruel.

name: Chris
text: A company that's been making waves in France lately.

name: Chris
text: Robert got involved hired and that's roughly when he became distant.

name: Earch
text: What about their ''theories''? Would you know what he's talking about ?

name: Chris
text: They weren't big on theories, these guys were all about getting things done.

name: Chris
text: But the way he's talking... Robert, what have you done ?
